short_summary: Request for Proposals (RFP) \\u2013 Leased Office Space in Stratford, ON.
description: Request for Proposals (RFP)  \\u2013 Leased Office Space (Stratford, ON)About FCC:FCC is Canada\\u2019s leading agriculture and food lender, with a healthy loan portfolio of more than $44 billion. Our employees are dedicated to the future of Canadian agriculture and food. We provide flexible, competitively priced financing, management software, information and knowledge specifically designed for the agriculture and food industry. As a self-sustaining Crown corporation, we provide an appropriate return to our shareholder, and reinvest our profits back into the industry and communities we serve. For more information, visit fcc.ca.RFP Scope:FCC is seeking to lease approximately 6,000  \\u2013 7,000 usable square feet of office space in Stratford, ON. The intention is to lease the office space for a period of five (5) years, with two (2) additional five (5) year extension options. For a complete list of requirements, refer to the RFP Scope (Part 4) for further details.RFP Schedule:RFP issue date: October 21, 2022Vendor questions accepted until: October 28, 2022 at 2:00PM*RFP closing date and time: November 18, 2022 at 2:00 PM **Note: All times are CST, SaskatchewanRFP Process Considerations:Vendors should note that:this opportunity notice references a non-binding, competitive RFP, not a call for tenders. FCC is not obligated to proceed with the work described in the RFP scope, and may cancel the RFP at any time.FCC\\u2019s procurement process allows for negotiation between FCC and one or more vendors, prior to awarding a contract.Requesting the RFP Document:Capable vendors who are interested in receiving a copy of the RFP document are to contact:Chris UgochukwuProcurement and Vendor ManagerFarm Credit Canadaprocurement@fcc.caNote: Vendors do not receive the RFP document by registering for the list of interested suppliers (\\\\\\\\
